review_title: MOVEMENT ACTIVITY IS A NECESSARY CONDITION FOR A HEALTHY LIFE
review_text: Movement is life and health, they said already in ancient times. To maintain health, movement is necessary. In the century of technological development, our motor activity has decreased to a minimum. We get to work by transport, we go up to the apartment by elevator, we do not have hard physical work at home, because there are vacuum cleaners, washing machines and other benefits of civilization. In the evening, we don't go for a walk, but watch TV or "surf" on the Internet. And movement of the body is necessary, without it our well-being will not improve. Sometimes it's easier to go to the gym or fitness class than to force yourself to do something at home. Come on! Choose what you like and do it! Of course, it can be advised to get to work on foot and climb to the floor without using the elevator. But we are always in a hurry! The only way out is the gym and active recreation. Physical activity is a necessity for a healthy lifestyle

The hormonal changes that occur during menopause can really affect your quality of life. That's why SMNutrition makes supplements that support women through all stages of menopause. Estro-Aid is a carefully selected blend of nutrients and herbal extracts to support women's health and hormone balance. Here are just a few and the areas they work in: DIM for estrogen metabolism, red clover for moderate hot flashes and breast tenderness, vitex for regular periods and mood support, black cohosh for estrogen balance, anxiety and mild hot flashes, vitamins B12 and CoQ10 for energy levels and alertness, plus Folate for hot flashes and general hormonal health. Other supportive ingredients such as turmeric, red raspberry and chrysin are powerful plant extracts that provide tremendous antioxidant value to promote daily health, stress resistance and cellular balance.

I bought it. The black cohosh and DIM I'm drinking now, the citrus bioflavonoids I'm drinking with vitamin C, and the wild yam I'm drinking occasionally in hot weather are also good. I don't drink Black Clover because I wonder if soy milk is enough for estrogen. change here if you like
